scripts.build: tsc && vite build && npm run compile && cp src/editor/renderEngine/renderEngine.wasm dist/
scripts.compile: emcc -O3 src/editor/renderEngine/render_engine.c -o src/editor/renderEngine/renderEngine.js -s EXTRA_EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS=['ccall','cwrap'] -s EXPORT_ES6=1 -s MODULARIZE=1 -s WASM=1
